QuestData.Title: Turn the Scale
QuestData.Description:
I have been trying to gather some of the scales from the young hydra nearby.
Their flexibility and strength makes them incredibly versatile.
With all the cranky old hydra tromping around, I don't stand much of a chance.
Can you gather some up for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Hydra Scales from nearby hydra.
